Reviews.Title: Bought these before DESIGN CHANGE.
Reviews.Author: Tokyo Sandblaster
Reviews.Content: I got a set of these a few months ago and they are great.  I came back to order more but they have changed the design!  The older ones were actual casings from real cameras.  This new design looks incredibly fake and too "plasticky".  Also, how many real cameras have the cheesy flashing red light?  Almost none.  If you do buy these, at least don't put in batteries for the light to flash...that's a dead giveaway that they are fake cameras.  Unfortunately I will have to find another brand that isn't so obviously fake.Side note...a little trick I like to do is to label my FOUR cameras 1, 4, 7, 9 etc...if someone is sniffing around and they can only find four, they will expect that the others have to be somewhere that they can't find.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing.
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Got these camera's in the time alotted. Easy to put up. They look like the real thing. Stickers and sign to scare off the bad guys.

Reviews.Title: Security for my mom's
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: My mom lives in a pretty small neighboorhood, though it is close to a few highschools. Every year when school gets out it seems like the neighborhoods around there get small break-ins, nothing major. Her house had her window broken into, stole small amount of money and that's it. I purchased these for her to place around the outside of her house, and the back garage. They look real from a distance, but I think when you're really close to them, they look basic. We hung our high. The stickers were a nice touch. The only thing I would add to these is a battery for a red LED light. I had a camera as a kid that had 2 AA batteries that actually moved when it sensed motion... battery lasted over a year. I also recommend drilling a hole in the base of the mount, to feed the fake cord through on these, to make it look like the cord is being wired into the house. The fake cord as packaged (at least in mine) was just hanging off the camera.

Reviews.Title: It could have fooled you.
Reviews.Author: the will
Reviews.Content: Oh yea, they look for real. I got the 4pack and my friends think I spent a lot of moneyon video gear. Mix them with the real ones and it would be hard to tell. Take that you crooks.

Reviews.Title: A Bit Smaller Than Expected
Reviews.Author: Houston Guy "Daniel Hughes"
Reviews.Content: While I am not uphappy with the item the cameras are a bit smaller than expected.  Also no screws were included for the installation.  Overall they do look a bit cheap for the price paid.  While I will keep the item I would not reorder knowing what I do now.

Reviews.Title: Cute
Reviews.Author: KZ
Reviews.Content: These are cute little camera's, and actually look real from 20'.  Make sure you have your own screws.  They are easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Louis
Reviews.Content: I have 8 of these (two sets) installed in the awnings around my house. They look great! They have fooled everyone who has seen them, including law enforcement officers. Mine did not have a flashing light at all, but I wouldn't use that feature anyway.The little red stickers fade pretty quickly in direct sunlight. I live in Florida and the three in question face about 5 hours of direct sunlight per day. They lasted about 1 month. So, if stickers are important, I'd suggest purchasing them separately. However, the quality of the cameras is worth more than their price here on Amazon. These are a great deterrent!

Reviews.Title: Failed out of the box
Reviews.Author: James G Lisk
Reviews.Content: Failed out of the box.  Sometimes cheaper is not better.  Went through all the trouble of installing the damn thing, and it blinked about three times, then nothing.

Reviews.Title: Received 1 camera only-I was expecting 4
Reviews.Author: Chris Quesada
Reviews.Content: I was expecting to receive 4 cameras since that's what the description notes. Also it looks like other buyers (judging from other reviews) got multiple cameras in 1 order. My order arrived with only 1 camera. I'll contact Amazon to return the item and get a refund. I can buy the same 1 camera for $9 so I think the made a mistake when processing items for shipping.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made but you really can't tell.  Good deal for the money.
Reviews.Author: Matt Reigle
Reviews.Content: I installed all four of these cameras on my house and they look like the real deal from a distance. Some scrutiny would reveal that they are real. For instance, you can see the battery compartment on the back.  It should really make some thieves think twice though. I'll recommend them, its not a bad deal for the money as far as fake Chinese made cameras go.

Reviews.Title: motion detector useless
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Boss
Reviews.Content: Price was good and cameras looked good. Motion detector does not work more than about 2 or 3 feet away, making them useless when mounted above the door frame.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Fragile
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: First, shipping box and individual boxes for each camera were in perfect condition when received.Upon opening boxes and inspecting I found all four cameras had the mounting base broken off, where the camera attaches to the arm of the bracket, all four.These take two AAA batteries each.  Heat sensor works and light blinks and shuts off after about 20 second and resets.But kind of useless if camera housing/bracket is broken on arrival.  Yes, you could probable glue them together but you will still have change batteries at some time and possibly rebreak the housing/bracket each time.Look for another product.

Reviews.Title: Only One Item Ships
Reviews.Author: Nicholas J Smith
Reviews.Content: One of the four cameras were shipped.. Exact same problem as the most recent reviewer so we know it's not an isolated incident.

Reviews.Title: Imitation security cameras
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Purchased these dummy security cameras as a preventive measure.  The look real and should be helpful.  Product was shipped quickly and well packaged.  Nothing to evaluate regarding functionality since these are non-operational devices.

Reviews.Title: For the money, they're worth it
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Binetti
Reviews.Content: They look like the real thing especially from a distance, but the motion detectors are very flaky if they work at all.

Reviews.Title: just what i needed
Reviews.Author: STEPHEN ROBINSON
Reviews.Content: these were perfect! Looks real enough to fool them. Put them in my front office and may have to get more for my warehouse.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: mrausch
Reviews.Content: I ordered on a Sunday night and were delivered to my door step on Tuesday. Very fast the only thing is they look a little like plastic and not real. For the little they cost its worth it.

Reviews.Title: Realistic but lights poor
Reviews.Author: Bruce Feigenbaum
Reviews.Content: Look real, but rarely light up.  They blink when I put them in the window and cars come down the road, but when someone walks in front, waves, etc, they do nothing.  Maybe I'm doing something wrong?  They were so cheap decided to keep them.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Andy Hobaica
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my order. Exactly what I ordered!!! I cant wait to install them on my house.

Reviews.Title: dead cameras
Reviews.Author: happy customer "Joe"
Reviews.Content: So I bought these to beef up security at my house and they look just like real dead cameras lol did a little work with webcams and solar panels and poof I have 4 real security cams with night vision and zoom :) if you have some know how, these are good cheap housings. Party on Garth.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Drod1948
Reviews.Content: Lights blink for a few seconds and then stop blinking. No indication the "cameras" are on. Cameras will be unnoticed without lights.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Donnelly
Reviews.Content: This works great.  My kids think they are totally real and think I have gone over board big time.  My place seems to be a lot safer.

Reviews.Title: Works for me!
Reviews.Author: ilovesoup
Reviews.Content: They certainly look real and with the stickers, do the trick.  If I were a burglar, I go next door.  We didn't bother with the batteries, too much work to keep track of when they go out.  I got some larger signs to stick in the ground for the fron and the back.  I truly feel more secure now.

Reviews.Title: I love it...
Reviews.Author: Ally Mayai
Reviews.Content: I like this item, it looks just like the real cameras with blinking light at nights. it was easy to instal too.

Reviews.Title: you're been watched
Reviews.Author: ghavri ebanks
Reviews.Content: They do what they are intended to: Scare away evil doers. It's a good buy for the price - I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Rodger B. Terrey "jeeping rodg"
Reviews.Content: Ok ...plastic cheap constitution,but if they are mounts high enough &add; a wire coming out the back they are ok.....I sent mine back so I don't know how they weather....

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Holli M.
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my family to hang around their house in Florida.  They go there for the winter (snowbirds!) every year.  This year, a total **** moved in next door, and has given them nothing but trouble.  He appears to be sneaking about and spying on them, so what better deterrent than video cameras?!  He's a grumpy old man & doesn't know the difference....but he has been leaving them alone!  :)

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Delmus Bradley
Reviews.Content: These are great, got them for friends and they love them.  They require 2 batteries 3A's , and you have to change them frequently, I wish they had 2 double A batteries.  They are still great and would highly recommend them.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Enrique Elgor
Reviews.Content: I am surprise it okay I recommended but is not an excellent product, for the price is good tats it..

Reviews.Title: Its okay.
Reviews.Author: Jason P. Estrella
Reviews.Content: You get what you paid for. This thing is mostly composed of plastic and should not be exposed into the sun unless you want it to fade. My Suggestion would be to have these things indoors and have it pointing outside.

Reviews.Title: Not easy to install & wrong battewry size quoted
Reviews.Author: aubrey roy naturman
Reviews.Content: They gave wrong battery size so I landed up with wasting  money on a pack of betteries - plus an extra trip to the store for AAA size.

Reviews.Title: dummy security camera
Reviews.Author: Juan Herrera
Reviews.Content: i like it because they look so real,and with the led ligth flashing makes any body feel they are being recordedin camera.

Reviews.Title: Works , Easy to hang
Reviews.Author: john101
Reviews.Content: Easy to hang , works great .... You just need to keep out of weather or they will fade and rot .

Reviews.Title: Good item
Reviews.Author: Easy Rider
Reviews.Content: I was thinking about reinforcing my security system with more real cameras, but instead found these. They work just as expected (the sensor picks the light very well). The only reason I don't rate them with 5 stars is because a coaxial wire would have made them more real looking.

Reviews.Title: Lame, cheesy, not convincing
Reviews.Author: PeterInNH
Reviews.Content: Two stars (just barely) because they don't cost that much and may look sort of like video cameras to the stupidest of criminals.  Body is of cheap, brittle, shiny plastic unlike any real cameras I have owned or seen.  2-axis detented angle adjustments are extremely coarse so it's unlikely that you will get them pointed exactly where you want them to point.  Even if you are ultra-careful in tightening the screws, you will probably break the cheap plastic clamp mechanism in the angle adjustments (I did, on the last camera that I put up).  If you do, don't worry, just fill the joint with hot melt glue which is more secure than the crappy plastic that the camera is made out of.  The cameras are also pretty small (camera body about 5" long by 2" diameter) so if you mount them high enough to conceal the fake-ness a bit, they probably won't be noticed at all.Oh and the only one that I bothered trying the LED feature on -- it didn't work at all.  Batteries installed, took it into a dark closet, waited a minute, nothing.  There is a button to turn it on and off (no way to tell ON or OFF) and I tried pushing the button several times, still nothing.  Wasn't terribly surprised.  Some day I'll pop it open and see if there is even any circuitry inside -- wouldn't doubt it if there is none.

Reviews.Title: Great set
Reviews.Author: Gloria Spacek
Reviews.Content: Am using this set to deter theft in our driveway and back yard. So far works great. Have neighbors that think they are great too

Reviews.Title: best dummy camera value I purchased so far
Reviews.Author: Victoria Portillo
Reviews.Content: these look like the real thing and have an intermittent led that comes on after dark. Great addition to the real thing and they were very reasonable

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Joseph Ramirez
Reviews.Content: Excellent price and looks like real thing, I wish the adjustments were more easy to set so camera can be set better view

Reviews.Title: Flimsy and not very cinvincing
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: The plastic that these are made of is very cheap and flimsy be very careful while installing. The little red light does blink but only for 20 seconds then stops for a full minute then repeats that cycle.

Reviews.Title: no one hanging around! Looking at my truck!
Reviews.Author: morris allen
Reviews.Content: Any more since the blinking LEDs. theses cameras,has fool every one; i say nothing ,let the Leds do the talking!

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: Villages of Oscoda, HOA
Reviews.Content: We needed just a little extra "security" for our local playground. We bought these to see if it will deter vandals from destroying our playground. We will see!

Reviews.Title: Only $6 looks almost real from few feet away.
Reviews.Author: Kit K.
Reviews.Content: The products works as advertised. From a few feet away looks real. Very hard to change the batteries in it however, especially if you're up on a ladder.  But what do you expect the only cost $6 each.

Reviews.Title: very real looking!
Reviews.Author: Yolany Trujillo
Reviews.Content: easy to install, the only thing is the battery size is AAA and not AA like the booklet says it is.

Reviews.Title: Not great
Reviews.Author: 19MJG63
Reviews.Content: They do look like dummy cameras, actually returned them and will get others.  I will pay a little more to get better fakes

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: suzie
Reviews.Content: I feel like these are not cheap looking and will work for what we need it to. Says AA batteries on the the directions but they need AAA. Thanks

Reviews.Title: they worked for about 2 days.
Reviews.Author: ed papin
Reviews.Content: I got these to install on a vacant property and while they look real, the red lights only worked for a day or so.  I replaced the batteries in all 4 of them and nothing.........

Reviews.Title: Does the job and creates the effect
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: Thought these would have a constant blinking red light; however, they doactivate when someone goes by them, so good enough.Bought separate Warning signs because the ones that come with the pack arenot as noticeable.  Overall, provides the effect we were looking for and affordable.Mix them in with the real ones if you have them, too.

Reviews.Title: Very Cheap
Reviews.Author: Roberspharm
Reviews.Content: Two of the four switches/lights don't work.  Better to spend more money to get a better "fake" camera.  I can picture the thieves laughing when they see these things.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Miller
Reviews.Content: I chose the four pack cameras with the blinking infra red light for our neighborhood swimming pool.  The fake cameras work fine and I hope they will help to eliminate the vandalism that has occured at the pool.  I like the realism of these units and they were very easy to install.  I do however think that the motion sensing red light should activate within a larger range, as you have to be very close to them (like 3 to 4 feet) before they will start blinking.  I would recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Set of 4 Dummy Security cameras
Reviews.Author: Marion Frank
Reviews.Content: They look real from far away and they will flash a red light if you put a battery in. Very inexpensive to use as a deterrent for thieves who might want to break into your home.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Plastic
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Souza
Reviews.Content: Camera looks good and sounds good on the internet site for description, but very cheap, flimsy and probably won't last long with the extreme summer heat here in Arizona.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Crogers
Reviews.Content: 15-20 feet up in the air, they look great. Yes, they're cheap as all get out, but that makes no difference. I'm not using the blinking light on any of them (didn't even try them out). Tossed the cheap looking window stickers. "VideoSecu" ... seriously? Bottom line: Glad I bought them for my home exterior. Exactly what I was hoping for at $25.

Reviews.Title: Makes them stop and think
Reviews.Author: Jason A. Tabacheck "Grumpy"
Reviews.Content: Ours arrived with some mounts broken, they were able to be setup however and family feels a little more secure.

Reviews.Title: ok dummy camera
Reviews.Author: rs
Reviews.Content: it's a good looking camera, but only at more than 20 ft away. Closer than that the fake becomes obvious and defeats the purpose. Annoying is "VideoSecu" label on the side of the camera - why print it there except to let people know it's a fake?

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: Bruce Porter
Reviews.Content: all red blinking lights burn out in a  few minutes. two came badly broken all wrapped in nice bubble wrap , showing they were packed that way.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap!
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Molfese "Bob"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. . . Two screws and its hung!  The problem is with the sensor light. . . It lights ONLY when it wants to. . . Batteries are a sloppy fit and don't always make contact.  I shimmed them and their fit is more solid now. . .BUT still the red light sensor only works on occassion. . .and sometimes that is hours after being tripped.  Don't waste your money....Buy something more substantial and reliable.  Remember the old saying. . . "You get what you pay for". . . WELL this product echos that  CHEAP!

Reviews.Title: Dummy security for dummy crooks
Reviews.Author: Christopher N Hall
Reviews.Content: I agree w/ what someone said earlier.  They look somewhat fake on close inspection.  Made of very cheap plastic.  But if you're a thief, I don't think you're going to go all touchy feely on the cameras.  I also took the advice of one of the other reviews, and labelled my cameras 1, 4, 7 and 9. hehehe.... the light isn't a steady blink, it -seems- to be motion activated, but I'm not sure.  It sometimes just seems to have a mind of its own.Here is my biggest complaint: the stickersThe blasted stickers, which have at the bottom a link to videosecu.com, where you can go and find this camera, CLEARLY LABELLED as a dummy camera!  I mean, really??!  Why would you put up a security sticker w/ a website you can go to and see that your camera IS A FAKE?!?  Luckily for me, I obtained some REAL security stickers from a local security business and used them instead.If you're looking for simulated security, these cameras will do the job.  But you can find better.

Reviews.Title: works as designed
Reviews.Author: mcmoore1
Reviews.Content: This product works as designed.  We have no complaints.  They look real. I have nothing else to add but have to have required characters.

Reviews.Title: Fake cameras look fake
Reviews.Author: K. Eslinger
Reviews.Content: These cameras are very cheap looking and look just like what they are..... FAKE.  I didn't even bother putting them up.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing!
Reviews.Author: S. Stark
Reviews.Content: I bought these for a vacation home to help deter kids hanging out and vandalizing some items outside the house.  I like that the lights blink on the camera as though they are taping.  For some reason, the never get activated except at night.  I believe it is due to their placements.  All and all, they are realistic enough to make somebody think twice before breaking in or breaking items around the house.

Reviews.Title: A value
Reviews.Author: 21's Dad "Talldad21"
Reviews.Content: After having a work van vandelized, decided this would perhaps be a simple deterent. More to be revealed. These are cheap plastic, but mounted 15 feet in the air no one can tell.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Content: look good and do what I needed and the price is right . I haven't used the led light so Im not sure how those work.

Reviews.Title: GOOD FINISH BUT DONT WORK WELL!!
Reviews.Author: mufaddal
Reviews.Content: OUT OF 4 CAMERAS I RECEIVED, IN ONLY 1 OF THEM THE BLINKING LED WORKS!! THE BALANCE 3 THE SENSOR FOR THE LIGHT DOES NOT FUNCTION & LED DOES NOT FLASH WHEN IT GETS DARK. THE FINISH OF THE PRODUCT IS GOOF THOUGH.

Reviews.Title: Nice decoys
Reviews.Author: S. Bourque "Steve in WA"
Reviews.Content: Great price and very real looking. Super easy to install and red light blinks on movement so very good for real appearance.  Freaks out the neighbor think I'm monitoring them -  lol

Reviews.Title: I'll see if it is working
Reviews.Author: Henri Savin
Reviews.Content: What a good idea? Does it matter if the camera is real or fake as long as it dissuades potential burglars?Look wise, these camera play the part. Feel wise, no... Touch them and you'll scream fake.So the trick is to mount them where they cannot be touched.Now I checked the price for a real one to go with my real system: $140... Compared to $25 for 4... What to expect?

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Mike60
Reviews.Content: Two cameras received broken out of four but the box's were not harmed so it must have happened in packing

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 4 x Dummy Cameras
Reviews.Author: miriam perez
Reviews.Content: From a distance anyone can be easily fooled into thinking that there are not real, as the cameras look very realistic. However, up close they do appear to be a bit flimsy. Two of the 4 cameras were defective.  One I was missing a small screw at the top and another was broken in 2 pieces.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: These cameras do the job. They look real and are easy to mount. I live in a cold part of the country and put two outside and they are able to  withstand the snow and cool air. The motion sensored blinking light is wonderful. The only lousy part is the the stickers they come with. I wish they were decals and not stickers so I could place them on the inside of the house. Other than that...everything is great!

Reviews.Title: It is what it looks like
Reviews.Author: Sea Men "Shootist"
Reviews.Content: "You get what you pay for." They were cheap, and do look like cams. But cheaply made, junky. Battery is difficult to get in and red "flashing" light works when it wants to - usually when i smack unit with a stick.  When mounting with a screw it wanted to 'split' apart along the seam so I had to modify.  Again, it's a cheap dummy cam.  Be careful about mounting, dont expect much - and you'll get what you pay for....

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: Ct. Yankee "Mac"
Reviews.Content: Although made with cheap plastice the cameras look real.  Only problem is the LED Flashing Lights don't work.  But because of the price for 4 of them one can't complain.

Reviews.Title: Good Cameras for the Price: BUT Security Decals are Worthless!!!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I installed the cameras and decals a month ago, in the winter, not exactly scorning heat and sun, but the decals are already faded a d u readable as if they had been posted for years. Suggestions to seller, remove decals and sell as is. Much better for you and the customer....

Reviews.Title: Dummy security camera
Reviews.Author: Micah McCormick
Reviews.Content: I really like these, There a cheaper alternative than putting in real cameras, easy to install and great for rental properties.

Reviews.Title: Rather flimsy
Reviews.Author: DocTerv
Reviews.Content: These cameras look real enough from a distance but be careful putting them up as they break pretty easily at the pivot point. Also the blinking red light worked for a few minutes only. They don't seem to be motion activated as described.

Reviews.Title: As Good as the Real Thing!
Reviews.Author: Paul G. Zimmer "removethehaze"
Reviews.Content: We moved from our home of 18 years, and left behind an eight camera, $10,000.00 CCTV system. I was going to purchase a smaller system, but after trying these babies out, I am impressed with their ability to sense movement and flash the red light. My neighbors think they're real, and if they think it, the bad guys will too! Any ways, it saved me at least a few thousand dollars, and the city cops would never use my CCTV recordings when we did record bad guys doing bad things around our neighborhood. They'd tell me the recordings weren't official "COP" recordings, and only good for insurance purposes. When I questioned their apathy, they responded that this [the recordings] and they were not CSI!

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing.
Reviews.Author: Kris Siuta
Reviews.Content: Everyone that sees them wonder which ones are real. Added these to the real ones without the cost. very belivable!!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: bought for my coworker for her home, she loves it.,recieved fast and works great.Love it. recommend to those of looking for a greatlooking security camera without the high costs

Reviews.Title: buena
Reviews.Author: kendall rodriguez
Reviews.Content: realmente por lo que pague, muy buena inversión, funcianan de maravilla y se pueden confundir con camaras reales, una muy buena opción

ProductInfo.Features:
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras
Easy to install with mounting bracket & screws. Built-in light sensor will turn on flash light at night automatically. A power switch can shut off flash light when you need
Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy. Mix dummy & real cameras to increase your security value
The inexpensive solution for security/theft problems with high professional imitation
The camera requires 2 of 1.5V AAA batteries (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 x Dummy Security Camera Fake Bullet Cameras Infrared LEDs Flashing Light Home CCTV Surveillance 1QU
